description: Kazann is a fictional character appearing in Marvel Comics, created by writer Garth Ennis and artist Clayton Crain. He is a renegade demon, an enemy of the Ghost Rider. Kazann first appeared in Ghost Rider (Road to Damnation) #2 (Dec. 2005).
name: Kazann
powers: but able to manifest by constructing a physical form from the bodies of others. Able to heal others. Extensive magical powers
